file_content.text: Yes, your clan possesses the Jedi lightsaber we seek. Commander Fetzellen and Jedi Xerender must be having this weapon.
Nice price for something we thawed out from the ice. The lightsaber is yours. Glad we could do business together, Talz.
Whatever they're paying, I'll double it.
We are tracked by the Sith. The warning is true.
Another interested party... I smell a bidding war. We're open to offers.
Don't be fools. The Sith do not negotiate. The Sith take and kill without thought. We triple the price and we fight together.
Triple, huh? Deal. Men, power up your blasters!
Sith clan discovers us! We all fight together!
